TopicTitle: Part test contracts only use stock parts?

Articles.Content:
Do part test contracts ever pick modded parts, or are they limited to stock parts?

I started a new modded career save, and was surprised to see my part test contracts are only asking for stock parts. I thought I remembered doing part tests with mod parts in prior saves.

Maybe I'm remembering wrong, or maybe my current part mods are incompatible.

it only uses stock parts.

parts in the stock expansions breacking ground and making history, sure. but not modded. basically, the game has a list of parts that it can ask to test, and it only asks those

Edited August 10, 2022 by king of nowhere

28 minutes ago, king of nowhere said:

it only uses stock parts.

parts in the stock expansions breacking ground and making history, sure. but not modded. basically, the game has a list of parts that it can ask to test, and it only asks those

Thanks. I remember seeing BDB parts in contracts but that may have been from BDB's bundled contracts rather than the stock part test contracts.
